Uses of Class
com.hazelcast.jet.config.MetricsConfig

  • Packages that use MetricsConfig 
    Package Description
    com.hazelcast.jet.config
    Jet's configuration data objects.

    • Uses of MetricsConfig in com.hazelcast.jet.config

      Methods in com.hazelcast.jet.config that return MetricsConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetricsConfig JetConfig.getMetricsConfig()
      Returns the metrics collection config.
      MetricsConfig MetricsConfig.setCollectionIntervalSeconds(int intervalSeconds)
      Sets the metrics collection interval in seconds.
      MetricsConfig MetricsConfig.setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether metrics collection should be enabled for the node.
      MetricsConfig MetricsConfig.setJmxEnabled(boolean jmxEnabled)
      Enables metrics exposure through JMX.
      MetricsConfig MetricsConfig.setMetricsForDataStructuresEnabled(boolean metricsForDataStructuresEnabled)
      Sets whether statistics for data structures are added to metrics.
      MetricsConfig MetricsConfig.setRetentionSeconds(int retentionSeconds)
      Returns the number of seconds the metrics will be retained on the instance.
      Methods in com.hazelcast.jet.config with parameters of type MetricsConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JetConfig JetConfig.setMetricsConfig(MetricsConfig metricsConfig)
      Sets the metrics collection config.
